00040 }

00042 /**
00043  * @brief Create new segments
00044  * @param int - The segment type to create
00045  * @param CNSegmentArray& - The segment vector to load
00046  * @param int - The affx sex code
00047  * @param int - The X chromosome numeric value
00048  * @param int - The Y chromosome numeric value
00049  * @return int - The number of new segments created
00050  */
00051 int CNAnalysisMethodSegment::newSegments(    int iSegmentType,
00052                                               CNProbeSetArray* vProbeSets,
00053                                              int iMinSegSeparation   )
00054 {
00055     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vMarkerDistances(vProbeSets->getCount());
00056     int iPrevMarkerPosition = 0;
00057     if (vProbeSets->getCount() == 0) {return 0;}
00058     int iSegmentCount = 0;
00059     int iMarkerCount = 0;
00060     double dSumConfidence = 0.0;
00061     double dConfidence=0.0;
00062     int iHetsInSegment=0;
00063     int iHomsInSegment=0;
00064     CNSegment* pobjSegment = NULL;
00065     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = NULL;
00066     int iStartIndex = 0;
00067     // If Segment type loh-segment, loh-cyto2, cn-neutral-log, normal-diploid
00068     if ((iSegmentType == 2) || (iSegmentType == 3) || (iSegmentType == 4) || (iSegmentType == 5))
00069     {
00070         for (;(iStartIndex < vProbeSets->getCount()); iStartIndex++)
00071         {
00072             pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets->getAt(iStartIndex);
00073             if ((double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == (double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh()) // Not = NaN
00074             {
00075                 break;
00076             }
00077         }
00078     }
00079     int iCurrCNState = -1;
00080     bool cytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00081     if (iStartIndex < vProbeSets->getCount())
00082     {
00083         pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets->getAt(iStartIndex);
00084         if (cytoScanHD)
00085         {
00086             // Case 1: SNP marker with CN=-1 sits at the beginning of the chromosome
00087             unsigned char currentChromosome = pobjProbeSet->getChromosome();
00088             for (int iIndex = iStartIndex; (iIndex < vProbeSets->getCount()); iIndex++)
00089             {
00090                 if (currentChromosome != vProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getChromosome()) break;
00091                 if (vProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState() != -1)
00092                 {
00093                     iCurrCNState = vProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState();
00094                     break;
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098         char cCall = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeCall(iSegmentType, getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt(), m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome);
00099         float fConfidence = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeConfidence(iSegmentType);
00100         bool bPar = pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion();
00101         if (cytoScanHD)
00102         {
00103             // Override cCall in the two cases where CN state makes a difference.
00104                     if (iSegmentType == 4) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 1)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // CNNeutralLOH
00105                     if (iSegmentType == 5) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // Normal Diploid
00106         }
00107 
00108         pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
00109         pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
00110         pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
00111         pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
00112         pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
00113         pobjSegment->setCall(cCall);
00114         pobjSegment->setConfidence((float)0.5);
00115         pobjSegment->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(bPar);
00116         iMarkerCount = 0;
00117         dSumConfidence = 0;
00118         iPrevMarkerPosition = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00119 
00120         for (int iIndex = iStartIndex; (iIndex < vProbeSets->getCount()); iIndex++)
00121         {
00122             pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets->getAt(iIndex);
00123             cCall = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeCall(iSegmentType, getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt(), m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome);
00124             fConfidence = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeConfidence(iSegmentType);
00125             bPar = pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion();
00126                         
00127             // Case 2: If a SNP marker falls within a CN segment (including CN or SNP), assign SNP marker with the same CN state
00128             // Case 3: If a SNP marker falls outside any CN segment, assign CN state for this SNP marker based on the CN segment just right before it.
00129                         if (pobjProbeSet->getCNState() != -1) {iCurrCNState = pobjProbeSet->getCNState();}
00130 
00131                         if (cytoScanHD)
00132                         {
00133                 // Override cCall in the two cases where CN state makes a difference.
00134                         if (iSegmentType == 4) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 1)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // CNNeutralLOH
00135                         if (iSegmentType == 5) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // Normal Diploid
00136                         }
00137             if ((iSegmentType == 2) || (iSegmentType == 3) || (iSegmentType == 4) || (iSegmentType == 5))
00138             {
00139                 if ((double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh() != (double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh()) // NaN
00140                 {
00141                     continue;
00142                 }
00143             }
00144             bool newSegmentTestFlag = false;
00145             if(iSegmentType == 2)
00146             { 
00147                 newSegmentTestFlag = (  
00148                     (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() != pobjSegment->getChromosome()) 
00149                  || (cCall != pobjSegment->getCall()) 
00150                  || ((getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt() == affx::Male) && (iSegmentType == 1) && (bPar != pobjSegment->isPseudoAutosomalRegion()))
00151                  || (fabs((float)iPrevMarkerPosition - (float) (pobjProbeSet->getPosition())) > (float) iMinSegSeparation) 
00152                                      );
00153             }
00154             else
00155             {
00156                 newSegmentTestFlag = (
00157                     (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() != pobjSegment->getChromosome()) 
00158                  || (cCall != pobjSegment->getCall()) 
00159                  || ((getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt() == affx::Male) && (iSegmentType == 1) && (bPar != pobjSegment->isPseudoAutosomalRegion()))
00160                                      ); 
00161             }
00162 
00163             if (newSegmentTestFlag)
00164             {
00165                 pobjSegment->setMeanMarkerDistance((float)vMarkerDistances.mean(iMarkerCount - 1));
00166                 pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00167                 pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00168                 pobjSegment->setConfidence((float)(dSumConfidence / (double)iMarkerCount));
00169 
00170                 if(cytoScanHD)
00171                 {
00172                     if(iSegmentType==2)
00173                     {
00174                         dConfidence = assignConfidenceSigmoidal(        iHetsInSegment,
00175                                                                         iHetsInSegment + iHomsInSegment,
00176                                                                         getExperiment()->getHetFrequency(),
00177                                                                         getExperiment()->getPError(),
00178                                                                         3,
00179                                                                         10);
00180                         pobjSegment->setConfidence((float) dConfidence); 
00181                     }
00182                     if(iSegmentType==4)
00183                     {
00184                         dConfidence = assignConfidenceSigmoidal(        iHetsInSegment,
00185                                                                         iHetsInSegment + iHomsInSegment,
00186                                                                         getExperiment()->getHetFrequency(),
00187                                                                         getExperiment()->getPError(),
00188                                                                         3,
00189                                                                         10);
00190                         pobjSegment->setConfidence((float) (dConfidence/2.0));
00191                     }
00192 
00193                }
00194 
00195                 m_vSegments.add(pobjSegment);
00196                 iSegmentCount++;
00197 
00198                 if (cytoScanHD && pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() != pobjSegment->getChromosome())
00199                 {
00200                     // Case 1: SNP marker with CN=-1 sits at the beginning of the chromosome
00201                     iCurrCNState = -1;
00202                     unsigned char currentChromosome = pobjProbeSet->getChromosome();
00203                     for (int iInner = iIndex; (iInner < vProbeSets->getCount()); iInner++)
00204                     {
00205                         if (currentChromosome != vProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getChromosome()) break;
00206                         if (vProbeSets->getAt(iInner)->getCNState() != -1)
00207                         {
00208                             iCurrCNState = vProbeSets->getAt(iInner)->getCNState();
00209                             break;
00210                         }
00211                     }
00212                      // Override cCall in the two cases where CN state makes a difference.
00213                         if (iSegmentType == 4) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 1)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // CNNeutralLOH
00214                         if (iSegmentType == 5) cCall = (((iCurrCNState == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0); // Normal Diploid
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
00218                 pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
00219                 pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
00220                 pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
00221                 pobjSegment->setCall(cCall);
00222                 pobjSegment->setConfidence((float)0.5);
00223                 pobjSegment->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(bPar);
00224                 iHetsInSegment=0;
00225                 iHomsInSegment=0;
00226                 iMarkerCount = 0;
00227                 dSumConfidence = 0;
00228                 iPrevMarkerPosition = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00229             }
00230             iMarkerCount++;
00231 
00232             if(pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == (char) 2 || pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == (char) 0)
00233             {
00234                 iHomsInSegment++;
00235             }
00236 
00237             if(pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == (char) 1 )
00238             {
00239                 iHetsInSegment++;
00240             }
00241 
00242 
00243             dSumConfidence += fConfidence;
00244             pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
00245             if (iMarkerCount > 1) {vMarkerDistances.set((iMarkerCount - 2), (pobjProbeSet->getPosition() - iPrevMarkerPosition));}
00246             iPrevMarkerPosition = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00247         }
00248     }
00249     if (pobjSegment != NULL)
00250     {
00251         pobjSegment->setConfidence((float)(dSumConfidence / (double)iMarkerCount));
00252 
00253         if(cytoScanHD)
00254         { 
00255             if(iSegmentType==2)
00256             {
00257                 dConfidence = assignConfidenceSigmoidal(        iHetsInSegment,
00258                                                                 iHetsInSegment + iHomsInSegment,
00259                                                                 getExperiment()->getHetFrequency(),
00260                                                                 getExperiment()->getPError(),
00261                                                                 3,
00262                                                                 10);
00263                  pobjSegment->setConfidence((float) dConfidence);
00264             }
00265             if(iSegmentType==4)
00266             {
00267                 dConfidence = assignConfidenceSigmoidal(        iHetsInSegment,
00268                                                                 iHetsInSegment + iHomsInSegment,
00269                                                                 getExperiment()->getHetFrequency(),
00270                                                                 getExperiment()->getPError(),
00271                                                                 3,
00272                                                                 10);
00273                 pobjSegment->setConfidence((float) (dConfidence/2.0));
00274             }
00275         }  
00276 
00277         pobjSegment->setMeanMarkerDistance((float)vMarkerDistances.mean(iMarkerCount - 1));
00278         pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00279         pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00280         m_vSegments.add(pobjSegment); iSegmentCount++;
00281     }
00282     return iSegmentCount;
00283 }
